imdb.plot outline: Hitch up the boat, pile on the gear, fire up the Ford F-Series and hit the road in pursuit of redfish, tarpon, bass and salmon alongside two respected authorities on the ways and wonders of each amazing breed in. Hosted by Flip Pallot and Preston Sharp, the show offers viewers a blend of powerful visuals with sweeping natural vistas, 3D animations and original storytelling.
imdb.title: Ford's Fishing Frontiers
plot: Hitch up the boat, pile on the gear, fire up the Ford F-Series and hit the road in pursuit of redfish, tarpon, bass and salmon alongside two respected authorities on the ways and wonders of each amazing breed in.
